snippet.title: Scholomance Academy Overview
snippet.description:
We’re thrilled to welcome you to Scholomance Academy! Renowned for providing its pupils with a richly varied magical education across multiple mystical disciplines, Scholomance Academy encourages the pursuit of double majors and offers a plethora of cross-over studies. Whatever flavor of major you favor, Scholomance has the training grounds and study halls to transform you into the hero you’ve always known you could be!

Scholomance Academy launches worldwide August 6!

• Pre-purchase Scholomance Academy: https://blizz.ly/2CAng4N

• Learn more about Scholomance Academy: https://playhearthstone.com/news/23453343

• Read the 17.6 Patch Notes: https://playhearthstone.com/news/23469099
